code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import DeleteOrder from'./DeleteOrder';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function OrderListItem(_ref){let{order}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between',alignItems:'center'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:["Order #",order._id]})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{style:{color:'#1976d2'},children:["Status: ",order.status]})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{style:{marginLeft:'1em',color:'#555'},children:["Total: $",order.total]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/edit-order/".concat(order._id),style:{marginRight:'1em'},children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteOrder,{orderId:order._id,onDeleted:()=>window.location.reload()})]})]});}export default OrderListItem;
